channel.title: Should the port forwarding be dynamic or the IP
channel.description: In my router I've just added a new port exception and I see it in the list but I'm wondering if it should say Dynamic next to it or my Ip address?

item.title: Should the port forwarding be dynamic or the IP
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

It is better if it is set to Dynamically because most ISP provide Dynamic IPs that can change at any time.

Read full topic
item.source: Should the port forwarding be dynamic or the IP
